directions: Place water and oats in a microwave-safe bowl. Cook at 50% power, stirring half way through cooking, until oats are softened, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir in butter until melted. Stir in bacon bits and Creole seasoning until evenly distributed.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon Creole seasoning (such as Tony Cachere's®)
title: Simple Savory Oatmeal
